from notebookutils import mssparkutils

timeout_in_seconds = 60 * 30

# Builds DIMs
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/ims_attribute_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/ims_dataflow_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/ims_dpia_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/ims_dsa_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/ims_entity_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/ims_information_asset_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/ims_integration_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/ims_masterdata_map_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/ims_ropa_dim', timeout_in_seconds)
